name: nao
tagline: AI data IDE for 10x faster data work
description: Nao is an AI powered data IDE for analysts, engineers, and scientists to write SQL, Python, or dbt workflows, preview changes, catch issues early, and deploy confidently. It connects directly to your warehouse and understands your schema so you can build faster, fix fewer bugs, and maintain trust in your data. Build data pipelines, launch quality checks, run analytics, and collaborate across teams without context switching. Think of it as your AI teammate built specifically for modern data work.

name: Hatable
tagline: Are you sure it's l*vable üëÄ?
description: LinkedIn is fake. Your friends are too nice to tell you that your landing page makes no sense. So we built Hatable. An AI Agent with only one directive: Choose Violence. ‚ò†Ô∏è It browses your site, parses your copy, and generates a roast so brutal you might actually pivot. This isn't a CRO audit. It‚Äôs a reality check. Drop your link. Get destroyed. Don‚Äôt say we didn‚Äôt warn you.

name: Claude Opus 4.5
tagline: The best model for coding, agents, and computer use
description: Claude Opus 4.5 is intelligent, efficient, and the best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use. It‚Äôs also meaningfully better at everyday tasks like deep research and working with slides and spreadsheets. Opus 4.5 is a step forward in what AI systems can do, and a preview of larger changes to how work gets done.

name: CatDoes v3
tagline: Team of AI agents build mobile apps for you & your business
description: CatDoes uses a multi-agent approach to build mobile apps for you and your business using AI. It's so easy to use that anyone, regardless of their technical experience, can build a mobile app and publish it on the App Store using CatDoes. In v3 we've added web deployments so you could deploy your project as a web app. We've also added a first-class GitHub integration which allows you to sync your project with a remote repo, tons of UI/UX improvements, daily credits for all, and much more!

name: Klariqo AI Voice Assistants
tagline: AI Voice assistant in 3 minutes. Built for non-developers
description: Launch your business AI Voice Assistant in just 3 minutes. No webhooks, no APIs, no developers needed. Built-in CRM, calendar, and analytics. Handles website chat + phone calls 24/7. Auto-books appointments, captures leads, answers FAQs, all while you sleep.

name: Speakmac
tagline: The offline dictation macOS should have had
description: Speakmac turns your voice into text on your Mac‚Äîinstantly, privately, and without draining your CPU. Fully offline. No subscriptions.

name: Raydian
tagline: The next frontier of AI product builders
description: We're an AI first full stack product development platform that enables you to build webapps reliably with a structured approach. We provide a chat-to-build experience coupled with a visual editor as well as an integrated backend, database, auth & hosting.

name: Sketch Copenhagen
tagline: Liquid Glass redesign, an all-new Inspector, and more
description: Our Copenhagen update brings a complete redesign for macOS Tahoe, with a contextual toolbar and all-new Inspector. Stacks now wrap, you can remove image backgrounds in one click, and organize your Workspace with nestable folders.

name: FlickNote - AI Voice Assistant
tagline: Speak your thoughts, sync everywhere.
description: Voice notes shouldn't live in isolation ‚Äî they should trigger action. No extra hardware, just your phone. Speak, and AI handles the rest: identifies tasks, syncs to Notion, distributes everywhere. We're not selling gadgets. We're building the command center for your thoughts.

name: Haxiom
tagline: The Online MD Editor for Collaborative Teams
description: Haxiom is your team‚Äôs AI-powered collaborative Markdown workspace ‚Äî Less Confusion, Less Tedious work, More Accessible documentation. With Haxiom, you can edit, create and share team documents. Powered by semantic AI to organize docs and detect duplicates automatically. Featuring real-time Markdown collaboration, publishing of documents as blogs, and AI Assistant to help with the tedious tasks.

name: Inbox Agents AI
tagline: The intelligent unified inbox for creators & builders.
description: Inbox Agents AI is the intelligent, unified inbox for creators and builders. It merges all inboxes and chats into a single unified app, then brings all important DMs + emails to your attention, cutting through the noise to what makes you money. Time to quit app switching and keep up with those who are using the tools necessary to succeed in 2025.

name: Hirecarta
tagline: Complete job search.  Completely personal.
description: Transform your job search with Hirecarta. It's not just another AI resume builder. It takes the time to learn your stories and accomplishments. Every resume and cover letter are completely written from scratch, not from templates. Get noticed, get hired!

name: Xplorer
tagline: A Secure, 100% Local API Client
description: Stop sending API secrets to the cloud. üõë Meet Xplorer: The secure, 100% local-first API client. It runs your existing Postman collections instantly‚ÄîZERO migration needed. üîí No Cloud Sync üë§ No Accounts Required üö´ No Telemetry ‚ö°Ô∏è Core Features Perpetually Free. Built for enterprise teams who need an "escape hatch" from cloud-forced tools. Your data stays on your machine. Period.

name: Shinkansen Fuji Seat Finder
tagline: Stop staring at walls. Get the Mt. Fuji seat.
description: In Japan, locals know that if you want to see Mt. Fuji from the Shinkansen, you should book seat E. Many foreign travelers don‚Äôt, and end up on the ocean side, staring at nothing. Instead of another complex timetable app, I built the simplest possible tool that answers just one question: ‚ÄúWhich seat should I book for a Mt. Fuji view?‚Äù I hacked it together over a weekend using AI. If you have friends coming to Japan, please share it with them so they don‚Äôt miss Fuji. üöÑüóª

name: Aden
tagline: Project Management for Real Work with AI
description: Aden is an ARP system designed for project managers who need clarity and profit control. It centralizes projects, resources, and financials, replacing scattered tools with real-time workflows that improve execution, reduce rework, and protect margins. If you‚Äôd like to try Aden, you can register for free and get immediate access to the product. Free access is available for a limited time while we‚Äôre in launch mode.

name: Loomoz
tagline: Effortless visual feedback & collaboration platform
description: Loomoz is a modern visual feedback tool that helps teams work faster and communicate clearly. Capture full-page webpages on desktop and mobile, add threaded annotations with arrows, highlights, shapes, text and comments, and collaborate live or asynchronously. Invite teammates into shared workspaces, assign roles, track revisions, organise projects, and connect Loomoz to Slack, Asana and Trello for smoother, more efficient feedback cycles.

name: ReadMeeting
tagline: AI-powered meeting summaries with team collaboration.
description: ReadMeeting is an AI platform that automatically records, transcribes, and analyzes your meetings, no bots or extensions needed. With one click, AI generates summaries, action items, decisions, sentiment, and key highlights. Organize meetings by teams, collaborate effortlessly, export PDF reports, and turn every meeting into clear, actionable insights.

name: Primeshot AI
tagline: Studio-quality portraits from your selfies
description: Primeshot is a new kind of photography studio, built entirely for portraits ‚Äì not prompts. Upload a few selfies to train your private Character, then create professional 4K photos in curated styles, scenes, and outfits in minutes. Beneath every portrait lies a model architecture designed specifically for people. It understands light, tone, and expression to create lifelike, consistent results that feel honest, human, and effortlessly real.

name: Product Huntr
tagline: Use product hunt data to find ideas and opportunities
description: Discover your next big opportunity with Product Huntr. Analyze 12K+ Product Hunt launches to find validated ideas, market gaps, and untapped opportunities. AI-powered insights for builders and makers.

name: Echosnap Ai
tagline: Record, transcribe, and organize
description: Echosnap is your AI-powered voice notes. Record anything on the go, receive a perfectly formatted transcript within seconds, and transform your words into summaries, action points, and you can neatly organize with Folders and tags.
